vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀδάμ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. אָדָם),
Adam: Luk.3:38, Rom.5:14, 1Co.15:22,45, 1Ti.2:13,14 Ju 14. Christ ὁ ἔσχατος Ἀ., 1Co.15:45.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.2.19;
married to Eve (H2332);
father of: Cain (H7014B), Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352); also translated "man" at Gen.2.19,21,23; 3.8,9,20; 5.2; "mankind" at Deu.32.8; "others" at Job.31.33;
§ Adam, "[red] earth" or "[ruddy] skin color"
Adam, (Proper name)

亚当 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "红土"

vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-đam « bụi; người; loài người » là Người nam đầu tiên do Chúa trời tạo ra. // H121 Stk 2:20; 3:17
